sources.title: Buddy's Circus
sources.description: Title: Buddy's Circus Summary: Buddy is a owner of a circus; he must save a baby who fell from the seats and performs with the circus acts. Directed by: Jack King Actors: Production Company: Leon Schlesinger Studios Release Date: 3 November 1934 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Buddy is a owner of a circus; he must save a baby who fell from the seats and performs with the circus acts.

metadata.Plot: Buddy is a owner of a circus; he must save a baby who fell from the seats and performs with the circus acts.
metadata.Actors: Jack Carr, Jackie Morrow, Jane Withers
